summary: A female argonian preset for Racemenu based on one of my Skyrim characters.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]
This is just a simple preset for Racemenu based on my main Dragonborn, Teremis. Technically, this mod's only requirement is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url], but she won't look exactly as she is in the screenshots unless you download the following:

[/size][list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62574/?]Feminine Argonian Textures[/url] (I'm using the Lizard version but the Chameleon version works just as well; you'll just be more colourful)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54586/?]Dread Tentacles - HDT Enabled Hair[/url] for Argonians (requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url])[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url][/size]
[/list]
[size=3]Armor used in the screenshots is the Mercenary Armor set from the [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073/?]Apachii Divine Elegance Store[/url][size=3] mod.[/size]

[b][size=4]Installation:[/size][/b]
[size=3]Extract file to [/size][size=3]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets

[/size][size=4]Uninstallation:[/size]
[s]why would you do that[/s]
Delete .jslot file (labelled "BethanysArgonianPreset.jslot") from the CharGen/Presets folder. Boom. Done.
author: bethanyk1879
